Variables.Variable: CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN 8527 WHEN 'A' THEN 8515 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 0 WHEN 'B' THEN 8516 ELSE 0 END as RaceConceptId
CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN 0 WHEN 'A' THEN 0 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 38003563 WHEN 'B' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END as EthnicityConceptId
CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'A' THEN D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'B' THEN D_RACE_CODE ELSE NULL END AS RACE
CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'H' THEN D_RACE_CODE ELSE NULL END AS ETHNICITY

1 as toObservation, d_home_ownership_code, d_household_income_range_code, d_education_level_code, d_occupation_type_code, case d_household_income_range_code when '0' THEN 'Unknown' when '1' THEN '<$40K' when '2' THEN '$40K-$49K' when '3' THEN '$50K-$59K' when '4' THEN '$60K-$74K' when '5' THEN '$75K-$99K' when '6' THEN '$100K+' end as VALUE_AS_STRING_4076114,
case d_education_level_code when 'A' THEN 'Less than 12th Grade' when 'B' THEN 'High School Diploma' when 'C' THEN 'Less than Bachelor Degree' when 'D' THEN 'Bachelor Degree Plus' when 'U' THEN 'Unknown' end as VALUE_AS_STRING_42528763,
case d_home_ownership_code when '1' THEN 'Probable Homeowner' when '0' THEN 'Unknown' end as VALUE_AS_STRING_4076206,
case d_occupation_type_code when '1' THEN 'Manager/Owner/Professional' when '2' THEN 'White Collar/Health/Civil Service/Military' when '3' THEN 'Blue Collar' when '4' THEN 'Homemaker/Retired' when 'U' THEN 'Missing/Unknown' end as VALUE_AS_STRING_4033543

0 as toObservation, null as d_home_ownership_code, null as d_household_income_range_code, null as d_education_level_code, null as d_occupation_type_code, '' as VALUE_AS_STRING_4076114, '' as VALUE_AS_STRING_42528763, '' as VALUE_AS_STRING_4076206, '' as VALUE_AS_STRING_4033543

QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_DETAIL.PATID, YRDOB, GDR_CD, ELIGEFF, ELIGEND, CASE WHEN eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE eligeff END as startDate, 44814722 as PeriodTypeConceptId, {raceConceptId}, {ethnicityConceptId}, {race}, {ethnicity}, {location}, {observation}, {familysource}, COALESCE(bus,'') + ' ' bus, CASE WHEN ASO = 'Y' THEN '(ASO) ' else '' END as aso, CASE WHEN PRODUCT = 'HMO' THEN 'Health Maint Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'PPO' THEN 'Preferred Provider Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'EPO' THEN 'Exclusive Provider Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'IND' THEN 'Indemnity ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'POS' THEN 'Point of Service ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'ALL' THEN 'National Ancillaries, All Products ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'UNK' THEN 'Unknown ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'OTH' THEN 'Other ' ELSE COALESCE(PRODUCT,'') END AS product, CASE WHEN CDHP = 1 THEN '(HRA)' WHEN CDHP = 2 THEN '(HSA)' ELSE '' END as cdhp, PAT_PLANID FROM {sc}.MEMBER_DETAIL {sesJoin} JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND MEMBER_DETAIL.PATID = ch.PERSON_ID )
select a.*, LTRIM(a.bus) + LTRIM(a.aso) + LTRIM(a.product) + LTRIM(a.cdhp) as PayerSource, m2.patid as baby_person_id, min(CAST((CAST(m2.yrdob AS VARCHAR) + '-' + DATEPART(MONTH, m2.eligeff) + '-01') AS DATE)) as baby_dob from a left join a m2 on a.patid != m2.patid and a.gdr_cd = 'F' and a.familysource is not null and a.familysource = m2.familysource and m2.yrdob - a.yrdob >= 12 and m2.yrdob - DATEPART(YEAR, m2.eligeff) = 0 group by a.patid, a.yrdob, a.gdr_cd, a.eligeff, a.eligend, a.startdate, a.periodtypeconceptid, a.raceconceptid, a.ethnicityconceptid, a.race, a.ethnicity, a.location, a.toobservation, a.d_home_ownership_code, a.d_household_income_range_code, a.d_education_level_code, a.d_occupation_type_code, a.value_as_string_4076114, a.value_as_string_42528763, a.value_as_string_4076206, a.value_as_string_4033543, a.familysource, a.bus, a.aso, a.product, a.cdhp, a.pat_planid, payersource, baby_person_id order by a.PATID
